name: NextCall
description:
NextCall Global is an internationally established contact centre group offering comprehensive and bespoke solutions to clientele across the EMEA region. With state of the art facilities based in South Africa, Dubai, and the UK.
NextCall Global offers high quality in and outbound call handling, telemarketing and total CRM solutions, with a combination of high quality controls, knowledgeable agent teams, cutting edge technology, and unprecedented flexibility, NextCall Global has a commitment to exceed client expectations on every project we undertake. Our approach is both consultative and collaborative and we are committed to growing your business through the provision of World Class Contact Centre Solutions.
